short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A utility to manage your daily activities

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to record your daily activities and manage your time. For HEDCO employees this also allows them to automatically fill their time-sheet.
